metadata.title: Volentis.ai - European AI with Trust at the Core
metadata.description: Enterprise AI you can trust — no hallucinations, no data leaks, no compliance risks. The only AI assistant built for European enterprises.

hero.title: Volentis.ai
hero.subtitle: You know the question; Volentis.ai finds the reliable answer
hero.description: Take your company knowledge everywhere with 24/7 access to reliable answers from your own documents — the only AI assistant built for European enterprises.

chatDemo.userMessage: What is our parental leave policy for employees in Germany?
chatDemo.aiResponse: Based on your HR Policy Handbook (Section 4.2) and the German Employment Guidelines, employees in Germany are entitled to...

useCases.sectionTitle: Which problem do you want to solve?
useCases.sectionSubtitle: Choose your challenge and discover how Volentis.ai can help

legal.title: Legal & Contracts
legal.description: Contract review 70% faster, never miss a clause

compliance.title: Compliance & Risk
compliance.description: GDPR & EU AI Act audit-ready in hours

international.title: International
international.description: One platform for all your EU jurisdictions

documents.title: Answers from your own documents
documents.description: Volentis.ai works exclusively with your approved company knowledge. No external sources, no guesswork — only verified information from your HR handbooks, contracts, and policies.

sources.title: Source citation with every answer
sources.description: Every answer includes exact references to the source documents. Click through to the relevant passage and verify the information yourself. Complete transparency, always.

search.title: Powerful search with AI
search.description: Go beyond keyword search. Our AI understands the meaning of your questions and finds relevant information even when the exact words don't match.

collaboration.title: Collaborate and share
collaboration.description: Share conversations with colleagues, collaborate on complex queries, and build a shared knowledge base that grows with your organization.

value.videoDescription: Watch how our AI assistant transforms the way European enterprises handle internal knowledge.

reliable.title: Reliable Answers
reliable.description: No hallucinations — only verified information from your approved documents with confidence scoring.

audit.title: Complete Audit Trail
audit.description: Every interaction is logged. Full traceability for compliance and quality assurance.

compliance.title: Compliance by Design
compliance.description: GDPR compliant, EU AI Act ready. Built from the ground up for European enterprises.

deployment.sectionSubtitle: Choose the deployment model that fits your security requirements

multiTenant.title: SaaS Multi-Tenant
multiTenant.description: Live in weeks, EU data centers, cost-efficient

integrations.title: Integrates with your existing tools
integrations.description: Connect Volentis.ai to your HR systems, document sources, and collaboration tools

cta.title: Ready to transform your enterprise knowledge?
cta.description: Book a demo and see how Volentis.ai can help your organization find reliable answers, faster.

footer.tagline: European AI with Trust at the Core
